data.detailed_description:
IMPORTANT NOTE:
TO ACTIVATE THIS DLC IN THE STANDALONE .APK VERSION OF THE GAME, YOU NEED TO LOGIN ON PC AT LEAST ONCE.



What could be hotter than a dominatrix wearing a tight, sexy latex suit? Just imagine it. I'll bet you're drooling already. In this customization pack you will find a shiny latex lingerie set (with matching footwear options) in 5 different colours.

Have fun!
